doc:
Howard Truesdale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Truesdale 0 Howard Truesdale (January 3, 1861 – December 8, 1941) was an American actor. He appeared in the films A Corner in Cotton, The Purple Lady, The Pretenders, Bolshevism on Trial, What Women Want, French Heels, No Trespassing, Out of Luck, Ashes of Vengeance, Ride for Your Life, Why Men Leave Home, The Night Message, The Foolish Virgin, The Ridin' Kid from Powder River, Go West, The Combat, Fighting with Buffalo Bill, The Jazz Girl, The Stolen Ranch, The Denver Dude, Singed, The Tigress, Burning Daylight, A Trick of Hearts, Three-Ring Marriage, The Lawless Legion and The Long Long Trail, among others. Howard_Truesdale ( January_3_,_1861 – December_8_,_1941 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in the_films A_Corner in Cotton , The_Purple_Lady , The_Pretenders , Bolshevism on Trial , What Women_Want , French_Heels , No_Trespassing , Out of Luck , Ashes of Vengeance , Ride for Your_Life , Why Men Leave Home , The_Night_Message , The_Foolish_Virgin , The_Ridin '_Kid from Powder_River , Go_West , The_Combat , Fighting with Buffalo_Bill , The_Jazz_Girl , The_Stolen_Ranch , The_Denver_Dude , Singed , The_Tigress , Burning_Daylight , A_Trick of Hearts , Three-Ring_Marriage , The_Lawless_Legion and The_Long_Long_Trail , among others .
